Summary: Object visible by reflection of evening twlight.
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 3 other sightings in Stephenville on or around November 21st 2008
divs: Sighting Detailstraveling west on intrastate 20 after sunset I viewed something large and shiny, I pulled over to observe this as it was in the same proximity and time of day that I had viewed a similar sight last month.It was traveling slowly to the south at an altitude of 3-4 miles in a path to the west of Stephenville.It was visible for several minutes and as the light change it became clearly defined as a large oblong object possibly over a mile in length.I have military aircraft exp and could see comercial aircraft contrails in areas at higher altitudes.It faded from view as the reflective light waned.
